title: Out Of Range
body:
Hello Everybody,im having that problem since patch 7.2
when i try to make my Game to Full Screen it just shows Out Of Range?
how can i fix it please help

replies.body:
I found the solution in a video a guy posted on youtube.

He wrote two scripts that will fix your out of range problems in no time.

i was playing lol in window mode for more than a year now and nothing helped me except his scripts.

Donated that guy a few dollars for his efforts.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xvs8sDnjBq4

I fixed it verry simple and and it looks like fullscreen. Simply go to your game directory "C:/Riot games/League of legends/Config/game.cfg" look for "Windowed = 0" line -> change 0 with 2. Close notepad, when asked for save choose yes, then right click "game.cfg" and check "Read only" ->Apply->OK .
they told me until is fixed to try bordless or windowed but i dont really like to stay 5 patches like this ;)
i did it but nothing changed again,i mean they helped me but still didnt affect it

This sounds like it might be an issue between the client and your graphics driver. When you go into full-screen mode, your graphics card needs to do a lot on the backend to get the image to fill your screen. If it can't properly render the images, it can sometimes throw this kind of error message.

Let's first try updating your graphics drivers to see if that fixes the problem. If you're not sure how, check out this [**little guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1)!

still the same :/ 
idk whats wrong i have tried like 2-3 hours but again nothing

Since updating your drivers didn't work, there might be something very minor affecting your client. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech guys will be able to go much more in depth there!
